'''16w07b''' is the fifty-sixth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on February 16, 2016.<ref name="blogpost_16w07b">https://www.mojang.com/2016/02/minecraft-snapshot-16w07a/</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w07b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|2075|Biome color change is abrupt.
|16234|Crash when a player opens a chested horse inventory.
|30481|Enchanted fishing rod doesn't glow when fishing.
|55827|Incomplete end portals can be activated.
|88128|Lightning strikes cause new mobs to face south.
|;dev
|85101|Cast fishing rod item doesn't show as cast/predicate tag "cast" doesn't work as intended.
|85838|Throwing a lingering potion close to a player centers it on the player.
|92093|Cannot {{cmd|setblock}} aged frosted ice, but you can clone it.
|94451|Console spam of messages like <code>vl@394114ec</code>.
|96583|Riding entities down elevation deals damage on dismount.
|96822|Horses dismounting players/disappearing.
|97225|Subtitle mistakes and typos.
|;previous
|97178|Minecart with command block doesn't {{cmd|kill}} itself with <code>r{{=}}0</code> with riders command block and ridden ones.
|97207|{{cmd|achievement give * @p}} does not do anything and shows a useless error message.
}}</onlyinclude>
